pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chemical Information from the Web // Chemical information from around the web. This package interacts with a suite of web services for chemical information. Sources include: Alan Wood's Compendium of Pesticide Common Names, Chemical Identifier Resolver, ChEBI, Chemical Translation Service, ChemSpider, ETOX, Flavornet, NIST Chemistry WebBook, OPSIN, PubChem, SRS, Wikidata.
